directions.step: Move for one kilometer(1km)
Take the sharp bend by the right close to boy's hostel/EED department
Move straight for 35 metres and then turn right
The roads passing inbetween computer science and admin
Move for 10 meters and turn right and keep moving
You will see a building that looks the same as the one on the slides
Move for an estimate 1km
At the sharp turn to the right, look in the direction opposite the sharp turn
You will see the building shown in the slides above
Move for one kilometer(1km)
Take the sharp bend by the right close to boy's hostel/EED department
Move straight for 35 metres and then turn right
Move for a few seconds and on you will see a building on your left opposite the admin block
Move for a few seconds and on you will see a building on your left opposite the admin block
Move for 45meters until you see a roundabout
After the roundabout keep moving straight for about 25 to 30 meters until you see a U -Turn.
Take the sharp bend by the right and move for 20 - 25 metres.
Turn left and keep moving.
Take the first right turn passing inbetween Admin Block and Computer Science Department.
Move for 10metres and then turn right and keep moving until you see a building that is the same as the ones on the slode above
Move for 45meters until you see a roundabout
After the roundabout keep moving straight for about 25 to 30 meters until you see a U -Turn.
Take the sharp bend by the right and move for 20 - 25 metres.
Turn left and keep moving for 1 kilometer until you see a building like the ones on the slide above.
